name: Maggie

topics.response_text: You're my hero, ma'am. I want to be just like you when I grow up.
Well, Billy used to. Before he... before he died. I don't know now. Maybe I'll see if Manya will help me...

topics.topic_text: What do you think of Megaton?
topics.response_text: It's okay, I guess. I used to live way far away when I was little... before Billy found me.
I don't talk to most of them. Billy says that I have to be careful, even when people seem nice. And I'm especially not allowed to talk to Mr. Jericho.

topics.topic_text: Do you know any good secrets?
topics.response_text: Well... Billy built a safe into the floor of our house. He keeps all sorts of cool stuff in there.

topics.topic_text: That's all I needed to know.

conversation.response_text: Billy says not to talk to you.
Billy says I shouldn't be talking to you.
You said we could have that talk sometime. You know. About boys. I'm ready! I'm ready now! There's some stuff I need to know. Like, really bad.
Oh, yes! Please, please, please! Can we Billy? We could have so much fun. More fun than we could in Megaton, that's for sure!
*Sigh* All right, Billy. But you can't avoid the subject forever, you know...

description:
Maggie is a 11 year-old Asian Female.

A young Asian girl living in Megaton, Maggie is known for her energetic and friendly personality. She can often be found running around the town, playing with other children, or talking with her adoptive father, Billy Creel. Despite her cheerful demeanor, she occasionally shows a surprising understanding of adult topics, particularly when discussing her friend Harden Simms.

Maggie's Personality: Friendly, curious, naive about romantic matters, trusting of Billy Creel, energetic, and somewhat precocious. Maggie is innocent but not entirely sheltered from the harsh realities of the wasteland, having lost her biological parents at a young age.

Maggie's Backstory: Maggie has no memories of her life before being adopted by Billy Creel at the age of three. Billy took her in after her biological parents were killed in a raider attack in 2257. He was given a house in Megaton after the previous occupant was shot during a raider attackâ€”though some townspeople whisper that Billy might have been responsible for the shooting that secured him his place in the town. Billy has raised Maggie as his own, teaching her the ways of Megaton and even sharing the combination to his safe with her. The girl has grown up knowing only life in Megaton, though she occasionally questions her origins and the circumstances surrounding Billy's arrival in town.
